text:
Alberto Gutman (January 4, 1959 – February 17, 2019) was a Cuban-American Republican politician and convicted fraudster. He was born in Havana, Cuba, he moved to the United States when he was 6 years old. Gutman was a member of the Florida Senate from 1992 to 1999. In 1998, he was indicted for fraud and later sentenced in 1999 to two years in jail.
Gutman died on February 17, 2019 in Miami, Florida at the age of 60.
